name: The Pod Sydney
description:
The Pod Sydney is newest accomodation situated in Sydney CBD. We are offer the brand new facilities and conveniently located only 10 minutes walk from central station. We are featureing capsule bedding with personal lockers and Free Wi-Fi throughout the property. The Pod Sydney is inspired by modern and minimalistic living concept with the industrial interior design.

The Pod Sydney will make you feel right at home and welcome you to an unforgettable journey in Sydney 

******************************************************************************

The Pod Sydney beds equip with these following:

-	5 Star Hotel Mattress: King Single Size (Dimension: 103W*203L)
-	5 Star Hotel Pillow
-	Privacy Bed Curtain  
-	Reading Light
-	Power Outlet
-	Personal Security Locker (Dimension: 600W*500D*900H)
-	Towel Rack and Coat Hook
-	Free WI-FI
-	Free Bedding and Linens
-	Free Toiletries 

******************************************************************************

The Pod Sydney also provided:

* Fully Equiped Kitchen
* Stylish Dinning Area
* The Pod Sydney Lobby Lounge
* Communal Cable TV in The Pod Sydney Lounge
* Self-Laundry Coin Service
* Clean Seperate Male and Female Toilets
* Clean Seperate Shower Rooms
* Elevator

We have FREE LUGGAGE STORAGE on the same day of check-in and same day of check-out.

We have FREE Wi-Fi throughout the property!!!

*****************************************************************************************************

**Important things**

•	Reception open hours: 9:00 – 23:00

•	Check-In time: 14:00 – 23:00

If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform the property in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation. 

•	Please note that there will be surcharge when you pay with all credit or debit card.

•	Please bring photo identification and credit card to show the front desk upon check-in

•	Main entrance is automatically locked from 23:00pm to 9:00am. The main entrance unlocks with your room keycard at anytime.

Please ask the front desk for more information regarding of contact phone number outside reception hours

groupInformation.terms:
Payment:

-	For security and identification purpose, a valid credit card must be supplied at the time of booking.

-	Payment of 50% from total amount will be taken anytime 4 weeks prior of arrival date is required to confirm all group booking. 

-	Booking anytime during 4 weeks period prior of arrival date is require payment of 50% from total amount immediately.

-	Remain amount payment must be pay on arrival date or can be arrange anytime upon customer request

-	The Pod Sydney accepts Visa, MasterCard, Electronic Fund Transfer or Cash only

-	Credit Card transaction incur 2.5% surcharge on the total transaction amount.

**Note**  

Electronic Fund Transfer will need the prove of payment to secure booking
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Group Booking Refund Policy:

-	Group booking can be cancelled free of charge up till 4 weeks prior to arrival date. It will be refunded via the same method of payment used at the time of payment.

-	No refunded for early departure, change of check-out date, or change made to number of guests.


Group Booking Cancellation Policy:

-	Reservation cancelled 4 weeks prior to arrival date will incur 50% penalty of the total reservation amount.

-	Reservation cancelled 2 - 3 weeks prior to arrival date incur 70% penalty of the total reservation amount

-	Reservation cancelled 1 week prior to arrival date will incur 80% penalty of the total reservation amount.

-	Reservation cancelled 3 days prior to arrival date will incur 100% penalty of the total reservation amount.

-	No Show incur 100% penalty of the total reservation amount.

-	Cancellation will incur handling fees of $120 Aud.

-	Cancellation must be providing in writing by email only. Please email to “ service@thepodsydney.com.au “ with subject of Group Booking Cancellation with Booking Reference Number.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Age Restriction:

-	The Pod Sydney can accommodate all guests 18-years of age or older. The Pod Sydney may not be suitable for people 45-years of age and older as it may require them to climb ladder into the bed.

-	We are accept children under 18-years of age under responsible adult supervision at all times

-	Children must be older than 9 years of age to stay at The Pod Sydney. 

-	Children younger than 10 years of age do not allow to stay at The Pod Sydney.

-	We are not child friendly hostel. If we have any complaint about noise, we will have to ask for your corporation.

Smoking and Alcohol Policy:

-	For the health and comfort of our guests and staffs, a strict NO SMOKING policy applies to all rooms and communal areas at The Pod Sydney

-	NO ALCOHOL to be consume at The Pod Sydney anytime. Drunk, anti-social behavior will not be tolerated at any time.

houseRules.notes:
**Important things**

· Reception open hours: 9:00 - 23:00
· Check-In time: 14:00 - 23:00
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform the property in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

· Please note that there will be surcharge when you pay with all credit or debit card.
· Please bring photo identification and credit card to show the front desk upon check-in
· Reservations with invalid credit cards may be cancelled by the property, if the guests fail to provide another valid credit card information within 24 hours after notification
· Main entrance is automatically locked from 23:00pm to 9:00am. The main entrance unlocks with your room keycard at anytime.

Please ask the front desk for more information regarding of contact phone number outside reception hours

Age restrictions:
· Dorm rooms 18+
· Private rooms 8+ (must be accompanied by adult)

Christmas/ NYE reservations between December 23 2019 to January 3 2020 will be charged on the 1st of December 2019. 

Failed payment may result in cancelled booking, all bookings for this period are non-refundable or transferable.The minimum night stays at Sydney Central Inn is 6 nights during this period. Sydney Central Inn will contact you following your reservation. Travel insurance is always recommended.

The Pod Sydney  will contact you following your reservation.
